titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the Federal medical assistance percentage for Hawaii to 59.8 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 1/28/1998--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) as amended by the Balanced Budget Act of 1997, to increase to 59.8 the Federal medical assistance percentage for the State of Hawaii for purposes of the Medicaid program and the Children's Health Insurance program under SSA title XXI.
